articles.title: The International Space Station Is Getting Ready For A Fresh Array Of Solar Panels - Mashable India
articles.description: In the first spacewalk to not include an American or a Russian astronaut, a team of two international astronauts completed the prep work on the aging space station.
articles.content:
A team of two international astronauts has completed the prep work to install a fresh array of solar panels on the International Space Station (ISS).
